definitions.definition: an extra part or extension that is or can be attached to something to perform a particular function.
examples: the food processor comes with a blender attachment
synonyms: appendage "the shower had a massage attachment"

definitions.definition: a computer file appended to an e-mail.
the condition of being attached to something or someone, in particular.
affection, fondness, or sympathy for someone or something.
examples: she felt a sentimental attachment to the place
synonyms: feeling for; relationship with "he has a strong attachment to his mother"

definitions.definition: an affectionate relationship between two people.
examples: he formed an attachment with a young widow
the case has a loop for attachment to your belt
